Keep this DiGiorno pizza frozen, then cook for nineteen minutes and you’ll get golden crust and melty cheese perfection anytime with DiGiorno pizza.

name: Annie's Frozen Mini Pizza Bagels, Uncured Pepperoni, Snacks, 9 Ct, 6.65 oz
short_description: LITTLE BITES OF BIG FLAVOR: Enjoy layers of tomato sauce, cheese, and uncured pepperoni on top of a crunchy mini bagel
QUICK AND EASY: Heat them in the oven, toaster oven, or microwave in minutes for convenient, hot bites that will be a big hit with the whole household

MADE WITH GOODNESS: Contains no artificial flavors, synthetic colors, or added nitrates or nitrites; Made with whole grains; Except those naturally occurring in cultured celery juice powder and sea salt; See nutrition information for sodium content
SNACK TIME: Perfect for busy families, these mini pizza bagels make a great snack, addition to lunch, or appetizers before dinner
CONTAINS: One 6.65 oz box of Annie's Frozen Uncured Pepperoni Mini Pizza Bagels, 9 Ct
product_description: Product Description Annie's Frozen Uncured Pepperoni Mini Pizza Bagels combine delicious cheese, zesty tomato sauce and savory uncured pepperoni for a crunchy bagel snack! Enjoy bite-sized mini bagels made with cheese, organic flour, and tomatoes. This snack contains no artificial flavors or synthetic colors, and no nitrates or nitrites added*. These mini pizza bagels are made with whole grains. Simply take some out of the freezer and put them in the oven, toaster oven, or microwave. In just a few minutes, you'll have delicious bites that'll be a hit with the whole household! Perfect for busy families, they make a great snack, addition to lunch, or appetizers before dinner. You'll love how easy they are to heat and enjoy! Annie's makes products in over 20 family-friendly categories, from fruit flavored snacks and cereal to mac and cheese. For busy bunnies and families on the go, we help make life a little easier and more delicious by spreading goodness through tasty foods and kindness to the planet. *Except those naturally occurring in cultured celery juice powder and sea salt. See nutrition information for sodium content. Annie Withey believed it was possible to build a socially conscious & successful business. This was her mission in 1989 when she wrote her name, address, and phone number on the very first boxes of Annie’s Mac & Cheese. Her legacy lives on as Annie’s strives to change the future for our kids, starting with food. Annie’s, now based in Berkeley, CA, believes that food is the most powerful force for change we have, and that each generation owes it to the next to leave the planet better than we found it. This is why they make their products with integrity, invest in organic and regenerative farming practices, and always consider people, planet, and their bunny footprint with all that they do. Best known for their delicious mac & cheese and bunny-shaped snacks, Annie’s makes yummy products in over 20 family-friendly categories – spanning from fruit snacks to cereal to bars, plus a variety of gluten-free and vegan products for their friends with special diets. But Annie’s is truly more than just food. Annie’s is a purpose driven brand who believes that together, we can leave behind a healthier planet for our kids. short_description: CHEESE THAT WON'T QUIT: Indulge in the irresistibly gooey, even meltier cheese compared to our previous recipe; Sink your teeth into the original crisp crust with delicious diced pepperoni topping, cheese, and tangy tomato sauce

GOOD SOURCE OF PROTEIN: Get big flavor with pepperoni pizza perfection your taste buds will love; Good source of protein per serving; Tasty comfort food with the right balance of crust, pizza sauce, and toppings

QUICK AND EASY: Easy to prepare in minutes following directions on the package; Shaped perfectly for the toaster oven or standard oven; Keep a few frozen pizzas on hand for any time kids, teens, or adults crave a slice

MAKE EVERY PLAY DELICIOUS: Keep the crowd cheering with the ultimate game day pizza that never fumbles; Stock up on these party snacks for your next watch party; Pair with other favorite football snacks for a winning spread that scores big on flavor

product_description: One bite and the party's on! Grab a Totino's Pepperoni Party Pizza loaded with sizzling pepperoni topping, zesty sauce, and gooey cheese. This pizza not only cranks up the flavor, it's also a good source of protein per serving. Sink your teeth into the original crisp crust, plus even meltier cheese compared to our previous recipe. Absurdly tasty and mind-blowingly good, this pizza brings big flavor vibes to your taste buds. Easy to pop in an oven or toaster oven, take it from freezer to table in under 20 minutes. Late night cravings? We got you covered. Last-minute snacks for game day or movie night? Done. Enjoy this savory pizza alongside mozzarella sticks, pizza bagels, corndogs, and other frozen snacks. Keep a few packs in the freezer so your teens and kids can enjoy a quick after school snack. From party time to snack time, add this crowd-pleasing pepperoni party pizza to your grocery list. Totino's frozen pizzas are a classic that bring all the deliciousness without breaking the bank.

name: Red Baron Classic Crust Sausage & Pepperoni Pizza , 21.95 Ounce
short_description: RED BARON Classic Crust Sausage & Pepperoni Pizza is made with zesty tomato sauce, 100% real cheese and hearty toppings of sausage and pepperoni.
Our Classic Crust is not too thick and not too thin with just the right amount of crunch
An excellent source of protein and good source of calcium
Easy to enjoy– just bake frozen pizza on the oven rack at 400°F for 18 – 21 minutes.
Just a freezer away, our mouthwatering pizza is always within reach. Do not thaw
product_description: RED BARON Classic Crust Sausage & Pepperoni Pizza – One bite into our sausage & pepperoni pizza and you know this will be a moment to remember. Savor the mouthwatering taste of zesty tomato sauce, 100% real cheese and hearty toppings of sausage and pepperoni, all piled on top of our Classic Crust that’s not too thick and not too thin with just the right amount of crunch. Our delicious, sausage & pepperoni pizza is an excellent source of protein and a good source of calcium so you can feel good about every single slice you serve. Whether it’s part of a mid-week family dinner, a late-night study session with friends, or a quick snack before sports practice, let our frozen pizzas help you and the people you love savor every moment. Easy to make and easier to enjoy, this frozen pizza serves up quality and flavor in minutes so you can get back to what matters. Just bake this frozen pizza on the oven rack for 18 – 21 minutes at 400°F and you’re ready to serve a sizzling, melty and perfectly crunchy sausage & pepperoni pizza that will satisfy everyone around your table. Keep pizza frozen until you’re ready to enjoy. No matter the occasion, you can count on RED BARON pizza to please the crowd. You can quickly bake our frozen pizza as part of an easy dinner, giving your family more time to catch up over every packed bite. Everyone at your next pizza party will buzz about the perfect crust and its irresistible crunch. And you’ll feel the pride and excitement of bringing people together to share a delicious meal—and lots of memorable moments—again and again. Make your next meal mean more with a RED BARON Classic Crust Sausage & Pepperoni Pizza!

name: Rao's Made for Home Frozen Pizza - Uncured Pepperoni, Brick Oven Crust, Premium Quality, Fresh Shredded Whole Milk Mozzarella Cheese
short_description: INGREDIENT FOCUSED: Our pizzas contain a decadent blend of cheeses and freshly sliced uncured pepperoni for a taste your whole family will enjoy.
VINE-RIPENED ITALIAN TOMATOES: Each pizza is crafted with the utmost care starting with our famous Rao's Homemade pizza sauce made with naturally sweet, vine-ripened Italian tomatoes and fresh basil.
ALL NATURAL, PREMIUM QUALITY: Every Rao's pizza starts with a delicious crisp crust baked in a wood-fired brick oven.
MAKE IT YOUR OWN: Garnish with a dusting of grated Parmigiano-Romano and freshly chopped Italian parsley or freshly ripened basil.
CLASSIC ITALIAN CUISINE: Based upon the simplicity of traditional southern Italian cooking and crafted with only the finest, premium quality ingredients. Delicious speaks for itself
product_description: Each Rao’s Made for Home Brick Oven Crust Pizza is crafted with the utmost care. It starts with our famous Rao's Homemade pizza sauce made with naturally sweet, vine-ripened Italian tomatoes and fresh basil layered over a delicious crisp crust baked in a wood-fired brick oven. Then top it off with our decadent blend of whole milk Mozzarella, whole milk Provolone, Fontina, Romano & Parmesan cheeses for a taste your whole family will enjoy.
